oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā | [5]

itaścyutvā aparimitāyuṣastathāgatasyabuddhakṣetre upapadyante,  aparimitāyuṣaśca bhaviṣyanti aparimitaguṇasaṃcaye lokadhātau | [6]
